name: ELEKS
tagline: Your Tech Partner for Market-leading Products
description:
ELEKS is the partner of choice for many of the world’s leading enterprises and technology companies. With about 1,400 experts across Europe, the US and Canada, ELEKS helps businesses elevate their value through custom software development, product design, QA and consultancy services.
Featured services and areas of expertise:
Full-Cycle Custom Software and Application Development
Product Design
PoC Development and Feasibility Study
Blockchain Solutions
Security Advisory Services
Capacity Services and Smart Teams
Company facts:
​100 + active client accounts 
46.87 Net Promoter Score 
600 + end-to-end projects delivered​​
In business since 1991.
About 1400 employees as of Jun 2019
Headquartered in Lviv, Ukraine, we have offices in Las Vegas, Chicago, London, Berlin and Tallinn. 
To explore more, please visit https://eleks.com
